content: this adult sized crochet shawl can be worked up in a weekend and is so very easy it only uses 2 simple stitches easy repeated row and easy tassels it is a great project for those still new to the craft - very beginner friendly it is the perfect size and weight - not too chunky but soft breezy and warm pattern is one size fits most women s with pattern notes on adjusting for kids or plus sizes this is an easy level crochet pattern and the techniques you will need to know are double_crochet skipping stitch chain stitch and slip_stitch
